english: Playing online games is not a waste of time. In fact, some challenging games can improve your problem-solving skills.
chinese: 玩線上遊戲並不浪費時間。 事實上，有些具有挑戰性的遊戲可以增進你解決問題的技能。

english: High school students should be equipped with the ability to think independently and analyze data.
chinese: 高中生應該具備有獨立思考和分析資料的能力

english: Though some scenes are very bloody, I feel relieved when a murder case is solved.
chinese: 雖然有些場景很血腥，但是謀殺案被偵破時，我感到鬆了一口氣。

english: Of all the TV channels, I like to watch National Geographic Channel the most.
chinese: 在所有個電視頻道中，我最喜歡收看國家地理頻道。

english: Playing table tennis not only improves hand-eye coordination but also keeps your brain sharp.
chinese: 打桌球不僅增進手眼協調，還能讓你保持腦袋靈敏。

english: Their educational and informative programs attract people of all ages.
chinese: 它們充滿教育性質與充滿知識性的節目吸引各年齡層的人。

english: One of the reasons why I like this romantic movie is that it is based on a real-life story.
chinese: 我最喜歡這部浪漫愛情片的原因之一是它以真實故事為根據。

english: The exercise not only eases my back pain but also gives me peace of mind.
chinese: 這運動不僅緩和我的背痛還讓我心情平靜。
